text: Jinshuidonglu () is a metro station of Zhengzhou Metro Line 5. == History == The station was opened on 20 May 2019. == Station layout == The station has two levels underground, The B1 level is for the concourse and the B2 level is for the single island platform of Line 5. {|table border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=3 |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;" width=50 valign=top|G |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;" width=100 valign=top|- |style="border- top:solid 1px gray;" width=600 valign=top|Exits |- |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray; border-top:solid 1px gray;" valign=top width=50|B1 |style="border- bottom:solid 1px gray; border-top:solid 1px gray;" valign=top width=100|Concourse |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray; border-top:solid 1px gray;" valign=top width=390|Customer Service, vending machines |- |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" rowspan="3" valign=top|B2 Platforms | |← Line 5 inner loop () |- |style="border-right:solid 2px black;border-left:solid 2px black;border-top:solid 2px black;border- bottom:solid 2px black;text-align:center;" colspan=2|Island platform, doors will open on the left |- |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;"| |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;"| Line 5 outer loop () → |} == Exits == The station has 4 exits, located at the four corners at the crossing. {|class=wikitable !style="width:70px" colspan=4|Exit !Sign !Destinations !Bus connections |- |align=center colspan=4|A |Jinshuidong Lu (S) |Henan FTZ Building, Xinyi Road Primary School |43, 115, 160, 326, Garden Expo City Route 6, 游568 |- |align=center colspan=4|B |Jinshuidong Lu (E) |Greenland Yuansheng International, Zhengdong Aloft Hotel |43, 115, 326, 160 |- |align=center colspan=4|C |Jinshuidong Lu (N) |Zhacheng Police Station, Greenland Xinduhui, Xintian 360 Plaza |43, 115, 326 |- |align=center colspan=4|D |Jinshuidong Lu (N) |Kineer IFC |43, 115, 160, 326, Garden Expo City Route 6, 游568 |- |} == References == Category:Stations of Zhengzhou Metro Category:Line 5, Zhengzhou Metro Category:Railway stations in China opened in 2019
title: Jinshuidonglu station
